inn1.comm: thudded in just outside the off stmp. Left alone. Just a bit of away movement
Zaheer slides down leg, Gilchrist tries to flick it away but the late movement takes it away
good length on middle and leg, Gichrist plays it to the on side with soft hands and sets off

and India strike early! Zaheer drifts down the leg side, Clarke tries to flick it down to fine leg, the ball deviates a big way after passing the bat and umpire Aleem Dar is convinced about it and raises his finger
good start for Ponting as he eases that one from middle stump and flicks it to the fine leg boundary. Good use of the wrists there
beaten, fuller in length and just outside off, Ponting pokes his bat at it
back of a length, fired in faster outside off, Ponting shoulders arms and lets it go
full, swinging in to the left-hander, Ponting tucks it to the on side off thr bottom of the bat
full outside off, a bit too much width on offer, Gilchrist goes forward and square drives that on the up. Finds the gap between cover and point with little fuss
brings the ball in line with the stumps, Gilchrist drives forward and Sreesanth gets a hand to it
that was way too wide and Gilchrist has to stretch out, luckily for Sreesanth the ball rolls to fine leg and only a single
good length outside off stump, pushed to point
fullish in length around the off stump, Ponting gets forward and drives confidently back to the bowler. Sreesanth contemplates throwing it back to the batsman but holds back
Good length on off and middle, Gilchrist goes back and defends
lands it on a good length on off and middle again, Gilchrists turns his wrists and plays to the on side
bit of inswing on the pads, Gilchrist shuffles a little and works it to fine leg
full and wide, Ponting leans forward and drives rather uppishly to the left of point. Third man picks it up. Unconvincing stroke in the end
turned to the on side and Gilchrist sets off in a flash
the first of the match! short of a length on off and middle, Ponting swivels and pulls over square leg, the timing sent that a few rows back
greets Gilchrist with a lifter, the ball climbs on him and Dhoni collects it
that was a wasted delivery, short and wide outside off, the lack of pace allowed Gilchrist to slash that over point
driven and timed really well to mid-on, Murali Kartik dives and cuts it off to his right, brilliant stuff as he saved a certain four
full, on off stump, Gilchrist comes forward and drives forcefully past the bowler and mid-off
Dropped: fullish outside off stump, Gilchrist drives on the up and the ball flies off the toe edge of the bat to Dravid at gully. Dravid leaps up to catch it but the ball rebounds off his fingers
full on leg and middle, just taps it to mid-on and sets off in a flash, good running
driven square towards point, Ponting contemplates a single but the non striker isnt interested
full and outside the off stump, Ponting leans forward and drives elegantly past the covers
holds the length back a little, Ponting lets the ball go outside off
maintains the line outside off, left alone. There's still a bit of away movement for the bowler
the line ios closer to the off stump, length remains the same, Ponting shoulders arms for the third time
swing and a miss, just a little wide outside  the off stump, Gilchrist throws his bat at it, aiming for the covers, misses it altogether
Sreesanth errs by drifting on the pads and bowls it way too full, makes life easier for Gilchrist who works it off his pads past mid-on
driven on the front foot to mid-off
aims for the yorker length, turns into a low full toss outside off, Gilchrist drives and chops it onto the ground. The ball lobs up high and just flies over point. That stroke was all about power
full and wide again, this time Gilchrist times it well past the covers, the ball just beats the fielder and races away
pushed to the off side
good length on off stump, pushed to the off side
overpitched on off stump, Ponting throws his bat at it and the ball flies off the bottom half of the bat to the point boundary

beaten: for a change the Indians land it on a good length just on the corridor outside the off stump, Ponting has a feel for it but the late away movement saves him. the Indians go up in appeal but realise there was no edge
turned to the on side
good length outside off, Ponting isnt interested and lets it go
good length just outside off, punched to short cover
driven off the backfoot and Dravid at short cover does well to cut it off one-handed to his right
Dravid comes into play again as he stops another drive in his direction
good length on off stump, gets forward and pushes it to mid-off
just a little short of a length outside off, Gilchrist times that well square of the wicket, Uthappa sprints from cover and just about cuts it off before the boundary
punched behind square for a single to end the over
that's the line and length, on the corridor outside the off stump, Ponting realises that and shoulders arms
Zaheer works up a good rhythm and lands the ball on that corridor again, Ponting gives him the respect and lets it go
fullish this time, Ponting gets a stride forward and gets bat on it, drives to midwicket
good length outside off, shapingh away, Ponting opens the face and glides that to third man
short of a length on off stump, no sideways movement, Gilchrist gets his bat down nicely on it and defends with the line
similar length, Gilchrist goes back and defends with the line back to Zaheer

outside edge but no slip! excellent line around the off stump at a good pace, Ponting shapes to play to the on side but ends up getting a thick outside edge which would have been gobbled by second slip. Unlucky!
fullish, pushed to the off side

confident appeal! full and big inswing into Ponting's pads, he tries to work that to the on side and is struck at the bottom, Irfan appeals but the umpire Saheba nods his head. I tell you that was very close. Inside edge perhaps
drifting on the hips, Ponting shuffles and works it towards fine leg who does the chasing
full and on leg stump, shuffles a little and lofts it over midwicket on the drive
slower ball outside off, beaten. Good comeback by pathan
just a little too full outside off, Ponting eases that with an open face of the bat towards third man
brings the length closer to the off stump, driven to point
overpitched and Ponting gives it the treatment by lofting through the line over mid-off with an open face of the bat
even better! this time overpitched on middle stump, Ponting lofts with the line and scoops it with ease over the bowler
driven on the up and a thickish outside edge just falls short of Dravid in the slips. the batsmen take a single as the balll rolls away from Dravdi. Can't really call that a chance
aims for the outswinging yorker, turns into a high full toss at waist height, Gilchrist quickly works it off his hips to deep square leg
full outside off, worked towards third man
full on off stump, slower ball, worked towards mid-off
just drifting on the pads, a bit on inswing there, Gilchrist turns it off his pads to mid-on
full on off stump, Gilchrist aims for a booming drive past mid-off, doesnt get the desired placement and ends up slamming that to the fielder in the same region
pushed to the on side. Gilchrist searches for the gaps but doesnt find them
short of a length on middle, Ponting swivels and pulls with the line to fine leg
big turn from middle to off, Gilchrist glides that towards point, Sreesanth dives to his right and cuts it off
tucked to the on side for a single
flighted on off stump, too full and Gilchrist backs away a little and times that sweetly past the covers. This outfield is quick
just short of a length on middle, big turn again, Gilchrist rocks on the backfoot and cuts behind square., the ball races to the third man boundary
fullish outside off, Ponting drives and just bisects the gap between point and cover, Rohit Sharma sprints and does well to cut it off before the boundary
fullish on middle and leg, worked with the wrists to the on side for a single
good length on the stumps, worked back to the bowler
glided towards third man for a single
pushed towards mid-off
good length just outside the off stump, fended towards point
tossed up outside off, Ponting waits for the spin and glides that to third man off an open face, Pathan runs from short third man and cuts it off
appeal, big turn down the leg side, Ponting tries to flick. Dhoni and Harbhajan appeal but Aleem Dar nods his head
and Dravid latches onto one! Ponting was squared up by one which straightened after pitching outside off, the ball gets a thin outside edge and Dravid at first slip takes it easily
another huge appeal but Dar says not out, Hodge tries to flick one off his legs and gets beaten, the ball hits the pad and flies to leg slip, Harbhajan is getting sizable turn off this pitch
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
bowled slow and full on middle stump, Gilchrist leans forward and drives straight down the ground
full toss on the pads, Hodge leans across his stumps and flicks the ball towards fine leg
Pathan's searching for the yorker on off stump, Gilchrist waits on the back foot and drives to mid-off
that's his fifty! Gilchrist flicks the ball through midwicket and scampers through for a risky second run, it's been an aggressive innings for him, the signs are ominous for India

and he's gone! What a way to go, Pathan bowls one on a good length outside off stump, Gilchrist sees a bit of width and tries to hit it over cover but doesn't get the elevation, Uthappa takes a simple catch and the Indians celebrate a massive wicket
Pathan pitches one on middle and seams it across Symonds who gets squared up and is beaten
bowled flat on off stump, Hodge waits on the back foot and pushes to cover
Harbhajan drifts on to middle this time, Hodge gets down on one knee and sweeps to long leg
Symonds tries to sweep one from off stump, he gets a bit of a bottom edge but Sharma at leg slip dives to his right and gets a hand on the ball and saves the boundary
defended back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump, Symonds leans forward and blocks
the straighter one beats the outside edge! Symonds pushed forward in defence, playing for the turn but Harbhajan went straight past him
driven off the front foot back to the bowler
pitches outside off and angles away from Hodge who lets it go
defended off the front foot towards cover
short of a length on middle stump, the ball kicks off the pitch and Hodge defends on the back foot

poor delivery to finish a superb over, Pathan loses direction and strays outside leg stump, Hodge gets a tickle on to it and the ball races to the fine-leg boundary and ruins what could have been a maiden over

dropped! And by Sreesanth! Symonds plays a half-hearted sweep and the top edge swirls down to long leg where Sreesanth runs in from the boundary, gets both hands to it but can't hold on, he was on the move when he reached the ball and wasn't in a good position to take the catch
defended on the front foot towards leg slip
played off the back foot to midwicket
Harbhajan slips down leg side and Hodge manages to sweep very fine for four, Harbhajan isn't happy with his field
Hodge leans forward and defends a flighted delivery to midwicket
tossed up on middle stump, Hodge strides forward and pushes the ball to long on for a single
begins with a full toss on middle stump, driven to long on for a single
bowled flatter, angling into the right-hander from round the wicket, Hodge comes forward and blocks
defended on the front foot towards the off side
blocked towards the leg side on the back foot
drifts on to middle and leg stump, Hodge turns it off his pads towards short fine leg
beaten! Kartik pitches on on off stump and spins it away from Symonds who leans forward in defense
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, Hodge moves forward and across and blocks
Hodge tries to come out of his crease but gets beaten by the flight, he ends up defending the ball unconvincingly
another quicker ball strays down leg side and Hodge glances it down to the fine leg boundary, Harbhajan has been superb when he's tossed it up but he's strayed when he's bowled the faster balls
this time Hodge tries to drive and the outside edge flies wide of Dravid at slip and runs down to the boundary
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
Hodge waits on the back foot and defends towards cover point
Kartik pitches on off stump and spins it away from Symonds who goes on to the back foot and opens the face of the bat late to run it down to third man, Uthappa gives chase but makes a mess of it
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Kartik strays on to the pads and Symonds works him away to fine leg for one

caught! Kartik drifted the ball into middle stump, drawing Hodge forward in defense, the ball gripped the pitch and spun across the right-hander, taking the outside edge which went straight to Dravid, splendid delivery from Kartik
defended on the back foot towards second slip
he begins with a short ball which Symonds goes back to and pulls with plenty of power over the midwicket boundary
short again and once again Symonds pulls, along the ground this time
nudged into the vacant midwicket area for two more
Symonds tries to work it behind square but gets hit on the pad
short once again outside the off stump, Symonds waits on the back foot and cuts late, the ball races to the third man boundary, expensive over so far, 14 from it
pushed towards point for a single, Symonds has taken 15 off Yuvraj's first over
flighted delivery on middle stump, Haddin leans forward and defends back to Kartik
this time it's a little flatter and Haddin defends on the back foot
horrible mix-up between Haddin and Symonds, Haddin played the ball towards midwicket and Symonds wanted the single, Haddin sent him back and Symonds dives full length to make his ground
defended on the front foot to the off side
Haddin gets on to the front foot and defends towards second slip
tossed up on leg stump, Symonds works it off his pads, oh he didn't get bat on that, it's a leg bye
bowled flatter from over the wicket into Haddin who defends back to the bowler
short and wide outside the off stump, Haddin cuts it off the back foot and gets off the mark
flighted delivery on leg stump, defended on the back foot
Sachin floats the ball across Symonds, pitches on middle stump and spins it across the right-hander, beating the outside edge
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
full ball on middle, Haddin pushes towards midwicket off the front foot
tossed up on off stump, Haddin pushes forward in defence but the ball goes straight through and hits him on the pad and bobs towards slip
defended on the front foot
Kartik over-steps by a long long way and beats Haddin with turn outside the off stump, but Haddin has a free hit coming up
in an attempt to bowl a quicker ball Kartik strays down leg side, that's a wide and the free hit will be carried over
Haddin tries to smash it over midwicket but gets a top edge and skies a catch to Sreesanth at long on, he takes the catch but it won't count
defended off the back foot towards second slip
bowled quicker outside the off stump, Haddin lunges forward but gets beaten
Symonds makes room and hammers a straight drive past Tendulkar, a full toss took the spin out of the equation and Symonds made full use of it
defended off the pads towards short fine leg
bowled slowly through the air on leg stump, Symonds stretches forward and tries to defend, he plays it towards cover point for one

what happened there! Tendulkar bowled a straighter one just outside off stump, Haddin pressed forward and played for the legbreak but the ball threaded the gap between bat and pad and just missed off stump
defended off the back foot
pushed towards cover on the front foot
Symonds leans forward and plays the ball to point for one
full ball on middle stump, Haddin leans across and works the ball behind square
drifts on to the pads this time, Symonds tries to nudge it away but the ball hits the pad for a leg bye towards square leg
defended towards backward point
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
cut off the back foot towards point.
driven off the front foot to long on
flighted delivery outside off stump, Haddin uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and drives fluently to Harbhajan at long off
flighted delivery on leg stump from round the wicket, Symonds plays it to midwicket
dropped a fraction shorter on off stump, Haddin moves back and cuts but can't beat the in field
pushed off the back foot towards midwicket
Symonds tries to drive straight down the ground but inside-edges it towards midwicket
bowled flat through the air on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot
bowled quicker outside the off stump and angles into Haddin who lunges forward and lets the ball pass close to his off stump
defended on the front foot towards the off side
once again Haddin decides to let the ball go once it pitches outside off stump
Haddin tries to close the face of the bat and play it through square leg but gets a leading edge towards the off side
legbreak from round the wicket, pushed back to the bowler
full toss, Haddin steps down and tries to heave that over midwicket, he ends up chopping it down to mid-on off the bottom edge of the bat
tucked away with ease towards fine leg
legbreak on off stump, pushed on the walk to long-off
beaten, the legbreak straightens after pitching, slices Haddin in half and the ball sneaks between bat and pad and misses the stumps by a whisker
full on middle and leg, tucked away wide of midwicket. Good running results in two runs
tossed on leg, tucked away to the on side
tossed on middle, quietly defended on the front foot
good length on middle and off, Haddin goes on the backfoot this time and defends
fullish in length, driven down to long-off
good length on of, turns away, Symonds opens the face of the bat and dabs that towards point, Haddin sets off but Symonds turns down the single
pushed down to the off side again and Symonds turns down another single
high full toss from round the stumps, Haddin who's clearly struggling can't put that away as he ends up swatting it along the ground to the deep on the on side
turned to the on side
flighted on off, driven past the covers, good running by Symonds results in two
flighted on off stump, takes a few paces forward and pushes it firmly to long-off
tossed up around off, pushed back to the bowler
driven firmly back to harbhajan who does well to dive to his left and stop that
tossed on middle and leg, pushed to the on side
flighted on middle and leg, Haddin gets on his knee and executes the slog sweep. The ball goes sailing over deep square-leg
flicked off the hips to fine leg
pushed in flatter and faster on the pads worked away to the on side off the pads
full in length, aiming for the inswing, Haddin goes forward and pushes it to long-off
just a little short of a length on off stump, Symonds shapes to cut past point but ends up chopping it to Yuvraj in that region
short of a length and a touch too wide too, Symonds goes back and cuts it square past point, Third man stood no chance of saving it
Beaten! just outside the off stump, Symonds attempts a cheeky glide down to third man but is squared up by the extra bounce
good length on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
fuller in length around the off stump, pushed to mid-off this time
tucked away off the hips towards fine leg, Haddin charges to the other end and allows him to complete the second easily
good length, on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
good length on middle and leg this time, Haddin offers the full face of the bat and defends to the on side
Beaten! Sreesanth lands that just short of a good length outside off and manages to get good away movement, Haddin pokes his bat at it and was surprised at how that moved
poor stuff, strays down the leg side aiming for the legstump
pushed firmly towards the covers
a bit of width offered outside the off stump, Symonds waits on it and dabs that down to third man
good length just around the off stump, Symonds waits on it and chops it down to point
bit of extra bounce on that one, lands on middle, Symonds goes back and angles it down to point again, turns down a single
just a little width offered outside off and Symonds  is able to glance it down to third man for a single
Zaheer strays a little wide outside off again, loses his line a bit and Haddin this time glides it down to third man
thick inside edge onto the pads, Zaheer gets excited and withdraws his appeal
chinese cut! not much room outside to cut and the ball just gets a thick inside edge and races away behind the batsman and past the keeper
Haddin throws caution to the wind and charges down the track, the ball beats the bat and goes over the stumps
beaten! good comeback by Sreesanth, he gets good away movement after pitching it on a good length just outside off
pushed with soft hands down towards cover and Haddin sets off fast for the single
good length on off stump, cuts in after pitching, Symonds tucks it to midwicket and yells 'No Mate!' to Haddin
good length on off stump, pushed with soft hands to mid-off and sets off

Sreesanth is rewarded for a good over! good length on off stumps, Haddin goes for the loft over the head of mid-off, takes a few paces down the track but doesn't get the desired elevation. The ball lobs up and Tendulkar at mid-off takes it very easily
cut down to point
full in length on off stump, Hopes defends and gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
full outside off and in the slot to drive, Hopes makes full use of that half volley and bisects the gap between cover and mid-off
defended to midwicket, turns down the single
angled down to Yuvraj at point, turns down the single
good length on off stump, shapes away from the right-hander, glanced down to third man
excellent running, played down to the region of forward short-leg with soft hands and Symonds and haddin set off without hesitation
turned behind point and another quick single taken
drifts a bit on the pads, Symonds gets across the stumps and tucks it towards long-on
slower ball, legbreak off the back of the hand, the batsman reads it early, gets forward and turns it to the on side
runs in from wide of the stumps, turned to square leg
bowled quick on middle and leg, Hopes tries to sweep but misses and is hit on the pad
full and flat once again, Hopes waits on the back foot and nudges it through midwicket
huge turn and sharp bounce too, Harbhajan pitched it outside off and spun the ball back viciously into Symonds who tried to cut and was beaten
defended on the front foot towards the off side
brilliant! Symonds takes a couple of steps down the pitch and hits Harbhajan over the long-on boundary, massive power behind that shot
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
short and wide outside the off stump. Hopes waits on the back foot and cuts it wide off Pathan on the third man boundary
good length ball on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the off side
good length once again on middle stump, Hopes drives the ball towards long-on and gets Symonds on strike
Symonds latches on to a half-volley outside off stump and powers the drive through covers for four more, remember he dropped Symonds early on in his innings
cut down to third man for a single
Hopes opens the face of the bat and runs the ball towards third man
swept to deep square leg for a single
bowled flat on off stump, Symonds drives towards long-on for a single
Hopes gets down on one knee and sweeps from off stump to deep square leg
such power, Symonds takes on steps down and lofts Harbhajan to the long-off boundary, he's batting with ease now, like on auto pilot
pushed towards midwicket for one more
played off the pads behind square for a single
Hopes backs away and cuts through cover point for a single
bowled slowly up on off stump, Symonds leans forward and drives back to Kartik
just a fraction short on off stump and that's all Symonds needs, he moves on to the back foot and lofts the ball with sheer power on to the roof at midwicket, amazing strike
bowled flat and full on middle stump, Symonds deftly pushes it towards midwicket for a single
driven off the front foot towards long-on
bowled flat into the pads, Symonds leans forward and defends
slower ball on off stump, Hopes opens the face and angles the ball past backward point
Symonds waits on the back foot and plays a short-arm pull to deep backward square leg
good length ball angling across the right-hander,  Hopes tries to cut but gets beaten
full ball driven to extra cover where a misfield from Zaheer concedes runs
Pathan drops the ball short and Hopes cashes in by pulling in front of Sreesanth at long leg, poor length from Pathan, at his pace Hopes had plenty of time to play that shot
driven towards long-off for a single to end the over
driven off the front foot to deep cover for one

massive massive hit, that might have gone into the stratosphere, he came down the track, got to the pitch of the ball and smashed it over the long-on boundary, that's out of the stadium, it'll take a lot of searching to find it now, they've called for a replacement
bowled slower through the air and flatter on middle stump, defended on the front foot
drifting on to the pads this time, Symonds plays it with soft hands into the empty region at midwicket and sprints through for two more
he can be deft too! Symonds waits until the very last moment to play the most delicate of late cuts that runs fine to the third-man boundary, simply superb
Symonds lunges forward and defends back to Kartik
Hopes once again uses the width and length offered by Pathan and cuts firmly to the third man boundary, Australia are turning it on and the Indian bowlers can't cope
Hopes cuts once again but this time the fielder at sweeper runs around to field on the boundary
pushed towards mid-on for a single

full toss outside off stump, Symonds tries to drive through cover but gets an outside edge to third man, Harbhajan fires the throw in and Dhoni, instead of trying to catch it and whip of the bails, deflects the ball on to the stumps, Symonds makes a full length dive and replays show that he was in by the time the bails came off

that's his hundred! Symonds opens the face of the bat late and collects another boundary to third man, he's thrilled with his effort and why not, batting has been difficult today and he's been magnificent, he pumps the air with his fist and acknowledges the hearty applause from the dressing-room
driven through covers for two more
Hopes backs away to make room and slashes a short of a length delivery through the backward point region, he simply loves that area
fuller ball on off stump driven down to long off for a single
short of a length outside off stump, Symonds waits for it and cuts down to third man
caught! Hopes tries to pull an attempted short ball and gets a top edge that loops up towards Dravid who takes the simplest of catches at square leg
full ball on the pads, Lee gets off the mark by flicking to deep midwicket
short of a length outside off stump, Lee opens the face and plays the ball towards backward point
good length ball on middle stump, Lee moves forward and drives past the bowler,  the batsmen sprint through for two more
Sreesanth bowls the slow legcutter outside off, Lee backs away, waits for it, and cuts to deep cover to bring up the 300
Symonds backs away to smash the ball down the ground but slices the slower ball in the air towards cover where Dravid fields, he didn't make the effort to dive forward for the catch
another slow legcutter, Lee gets beaten and is hit on the pad
superb shot! Sreesanth follows up three slow balls with the bouncer, Lee backs away and guides the ball off the face off the bat to the third man boundary, Sreesanth applauds the shot

What Symonds can do, Lee can too, Lee latches on to a length ball on middle stump and swings it high and far over midwicket, that's cleared the ground as well and Sreesanth ends the over with two expensive balls after four good ones
cut off the back foot to deep point for one
Zaheer fires it full and wide outside off stump, that's too wide says the umpire
Zaheer fires in a fast yorker which Lee digs out back to him
Zaheer finds the block hole once again, Lee squeezes it out towards mid-on for a single

Symonds drives a full toss straight past the bowler, Uthappa runs across from long-off and fires the throw back into Zaheer, Lee had sprinted back for the second run and made a despairing dive as Zaheer broke the stumps, replays confirm that his bat is just short of the crease
pulled towards deep midwicket for a single

Johnson plays the ball towards midwicket and sets off for the single, Uthappa gets to the ball quickly and throws it back to Dhoni, Symonds had run back for the second but Johnson had no chance to make his ground as Dhoni whips off the bails

inn2.comm: good delivery to start with, good length on middle stump, Ganguly gets his bat down nicely on it and defends
just a little width offered outside off and Ganguly presents the full face of the bat. That was silken timing, but, driven straight to Symonds at cover
drifts towards the pads now, just a hint of inswing, pushed back to the bowler
beaten, just a lapse in concentration from Ganguly as he pokes his bat at one that swings away from him late outside off stump
strives for that extra yard of pace and slides down leg. He oversteps as well

Free Hit: Ganguly gives himself room and swings across the line. Her gets a big top-edge and the ball goes flying towards fine leg. Three fielders converge and they run two. The umpire signals a short run and that becomes a single
left alone safely outside the off stump
manages late outswing from middle stump and into off, the ball lands on a yorker length and Ganguly does well to watch the ball carefully and defend it
good length around the off stump and Ganguly fends it to the off side
back of a length, shapes away, Ganguly shapes to slice it over the off side and ends up getting a thick outside edge which flies over the gully region and down to third man
back of a length on off stump, Ganguly gets his bat down nicely on it and pushes it towards cover
good length around the off stump, punched firmly towards the covers
good length just outside the off stump, shapes away just a touch, Ganguly watches the away movement and slices it perfectly, bisects the gap between cover and point and the ball races away
good length around the off stump, swings away, Tendulkar pushes it to the covers
lands it on a good length on middle and leg, Tendulkar punches it to mid-on
slower ball, 72.8 mph, lands on a full length outside off. Tendulkar goes foward and drives it firmly to mid-on and sets off in a flash
silken timing! full in length outside off, Ganguly gets a half-stride forward and a defensive push sees the ball bisect the gap between cover and mid-off. the fielder at the boundary dives in vain
full in  length, just outside the off stump, Ganguly gets a good stride forward and pushes it straight to mid-off
good length on off stump, Tendulkar gets forward and defends on the frontfoot off the meat of the bat
lands just outside the off stump, Tendulkar moves across and pushes it to the covers
Tendulkar plays that down with soft hands just wide of mid-off, sets off in a flash and completes the single
Johnson attempts another away-swinger to the left-hander, lands it on a yorker length on off stump, dug out to the on side
beaten, phew that sliced him in half! the ball lands on a good length just outside off and comes in after pitching. The ball somehow beats an inside edge through to the keeper
pushed to the off side
full on middle and leg and in the slot to drive, Tendulkar gets forward and pushes it firmly towards Lee who dives to his right and saves it
good length on off stump, punched to the off side
back of a length, aimed at the hips, Tendulkar shuffles and tucks it towards square leg

Lee bangs in a short delivery, Tendulkar gets into position to play the hook but the ball is on to him too quickly, he goes through with the shot and gets a top edge which flies down to the fine-leg boundary

make it two in two! Lee strays a little too wide outside off, Tendulkar latches onto it and drives it square past point. Though the fielder got a hand to it, the ball had enough fuel to race away to the boundary
outside edge and the ball races past the vacant slip region for another boundary! that's three in three!

Johnson pitches the ball short and wide, giving Ganguly width to free his arms and cut, the ball flies in the air towards Lee at third man, the ball bounces a second time in front of him and spins awkardly to his right, taking him by surprise. He over-runs it a little and concedes four
full in length and pushed back to the bowler
drifts towards the pads, Ganguly shuffles across his stumps and flicks it confidently past square leg, the fielder in the deep picks it up
slower ball, Johnson thuds it in really short and catches Tendulkar by surprise. Tendulkar tries to glide it down to third man but was too late on the stroke
full, pushed down to the off side
tucked away off his pads to square leg, Ganguly runs the first run hard
good length outside off, fended to point
defended off the backfoot back to Lee
Lee gives him just a little too much width outside off, Tendulkar drives on the up and lofts that over mid-off and extra cover, the ball just lands short of the rope
good length on the pads, Tendulkar tucks it away off his hips to the on side and sets off quickly
wide outside the off stump, Tendulkar gets on his knee and square drives it, Hodge at point does well to dive to his left and cut it off
plenty of swing for Johnson but it drifts towards the pads, Tendulkar latches onto that offering and pushes it into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
punched past backward point for an easy two
slower ball outside off, beats him. Good change of pace to fox Tendulkar on that occasion
turned to the on side for a single
back of a length,on the pads, Ganguly shuffles across and works it to the on side with soft hands
slower ball, releases it off the back of the hand and lands on the full outside off, Ganguly doesnt read it on time and fails to dig it out
fullish in length on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
good length outside off, pushed towards cover
Lee strays down the legside and that brings the 50 up for India. Good start so far
Lee mixes it up with a bouncer and Ganguly ducks under it
good length outside the off stump, punched towards point
Ganguly backs away and gets the desired result! the ball lands just short of a good length on off and middle, Ganguly slices that over extra cover. A trademark stroke from Ganguly
Bracken starts off with a good length delivery on off stump, pushed to the off side
good length on off stump, Tendulkar gets a stride forward and pushes to cover
maintains the line outside the off stump, Tendulkar opens the face of the bat and steered that wide of point
short of a length on middle and leg, tucked off the hips to short fine-leg
similar delivery, aimed at the pads, Ganguly shuffles and places the ball just wide of short fine-leg, allowing him to go through with the run
on off stump, pushed to the covers
manages to get good bounce off a good length, catches Ganguly by surprise as he uneasily fends it to point
tucked off the hips to midwicket, good fielding the  end but the batsmen go through with the single
pushed towards short cover
full and shaping away, Tendulkar waits on it and deliberately opens the face and glides it past the vacent slip region. Good presence of mind by sachin
silken! half volley on middle and leg, Tendulkar gets forward and meets the ball off the full face of the bat. The ball speeds away past the stumps and wide of mid-on
tucked away off the hips, the ball beats short fine-leg and a goo d effort at fine leg stops a boundary
good length, on the stumps, ganguly plays back to the bowler
fuller and a touch wider, Ganguly chases it and gets and slices it down to deep point
full and wide again, Tendulkar plays with an angled bat and steers it to third man
good length around the off stump, pushed to the covers
varies his length, bangs it in short of a good length, the ball darts back in, Ganguly waits on it and glides it down towards gully
fuller in length, gets an outside edge down to third man
outside off and cut away confidently. Doesnt get the desired placement and cuts to point
attempts another cut and is beaten
cut square just wide of point, single taken
flighted on leg, Tendulkar tries to flick and misses, Gilchrist whips off the bails but his foot was inside the crease
now this was wide as well, down leg and correctly called
slides down leg, Umpire Saheba, for reasons known only to him stands unmoved. How was that not a wide> Beats me..
pushed to the on side
superb stroke! good length on off stump, Ganguly reads the length early and pulls from outside the off stump. The ball sails over the midwicket boundary
good comeback, yorker length to keep the batsman quiet
that was an ugly swipe from outside off, Ganguly doesnt get to the pitch of it and ends up chopping it down to midwicket
pushed down to the covers
fuller in length, outside the off stump, Ganguly opens the face of the bat and glides to short third man
turned off the pads to short fine leg
attempted paddle sweep, ends up hitting to Hodge at short fine-leg
turned off the wrists to midwicket
bit of turn from middle to off, pushed off the frontfoot to cover
pushed back to the bowler
glided to point off the open face of the bat
tossed up on middle stump, Tendulkar leans forward and defends
Tendulkar steps down the track and drives past Symonds at cover
bowled flat outside the off stump, Ganguly waits on the back foot and cuts as the ball spins away from him to Hodge at backward point
drifts down leg side, Ganguly tries to paddle sweep but misses
dropped a fraction short outside off stump, Ganguly cuts off the back foot to deep point
Ganguly opens the face of the bat and angles the ball through point, Johnson runs in from the boundary and fields
tossed up on leg stump, Tendulkar nudges it towards square leg
Tendulkar steps down to a flat delivery from Symonds and nudges it off his pads to square leg
bowled flat through the air from round the wicket, angling into Ganguly who defends on the front foot
Symonds appeals for a catch at slip as Ganguly leans forward in defense and the ball hits the pad before going to Ponting
pulled off the back foot for a single
Tendulkar gets down on one knee and sweeps powerfully in front off square, Haddin sprints to his right on the boundary and dives to make a fantastic save
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
massive spin, that pitched on middle and spun sharply away from Ganguly who went on the back foot and had to defend awkwardly
swept behind square for  a single
Tendulkar steps out of his crease, Hogg meets him with a quick ball which Tendulkar plays to cover
played off his pads towards square leg for a single
Ganguly works the ball off his pads towards midwicket
Tendulkar steps out of his crease and backs away towards leg to make room, he's aiming for the region over extra cover but Hogg bowls a fast ball and Tendulkar drives along the ground to cover
driven off the back foot through covers for one more, the asking-rate is climbing, over seven now
Sachin begins to come forward but then decides to go back and cut and was off balance as he played the shot, the ball beats the bottom edge
played off the pads behind square for one more
cut off the back foot to Hodge at point,  a misfield allows the single
bowled flat and fast into the pads, Tendulkar defends towards midwicket
Tendulkar comes down the track once again but gets beaten by the lack of flight from Symonds, he gets hit on the pads
Ganguly comes down the track and defends a flat ball towards cover point
this time Tendulkar steps down the track and, instead of looking at extra cover, he swings Hogg high over midwicket, he reaches his fifty with that six, India need him to carry on
driven down to long off for one more
Ganguly dabs it towards the leg side and sets off for a single, Hogg runs across and fields and there's a small mix up between the batsmen but no harm done in the end
Ganguly plays a paddle pull to midwicket for one more
Tendulkar tries to play a reverse pull but doesn't connect properly, the single makes it ten runs from the over
Symonds bowls it flat on middle and leg stump and once again hits Tendulkar on the pad
Tendulkar  steps down the track this time, making the length into a full toss and drives to Johnson on the cover boundary
played off the pads behind square leg for a single

superb fielding, Tendulkar flicks a full toss off his pads to deep backward square leg where Haddin dives once again and fields, he throws the ball back to Hogg who relays the throw back into Gilchrist
flicked off the pads to square leg
cut off the back foot towards point

Ganguly steps down the track but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, he goes through with the shot and nearly checks it in the end, the ball sails over the long-on boundary, he brings up his fifty with that shot
swept to deep square leg for one more
Tendulkar tries to cut off the back foot but misses
Tendulkar waits in his crease and drives a full ball through covers, he's timed that well and Haddin has more work to do on the fence
flighted delivery on leg stump, Tendulkar nudges it off his pads to Symonds at short fine leg
delicate, Tendulkar waits until the ball is nearly in Gilchrist's gloves before nudging it towards short third man
full delivery outside off stump, Tendulkar waits in his crease and square drives through backward point
Hopes strays on to leg stump, Ganguly moves across his stumps and flicks behind square, Bracken runs after it from short fine leg
Ganguly once again moves across and plays a paddle sweep, he doesn't middle it but gets a single to Bracken
slips down leg side and the umpire calls it wide
Tendulkar cuts a good length ball from outside off stump to third man
good length ball on off stump, Ganguly waits on the back foot and cuts to Clarke at backward point
full delivery on middle and off, Ganguly leans forward and drives to long off
Hogg turns it sharply from off stump away from the left-hander, Ganguly cuts off the back foot to deep point
a fraction short and Tendulkar jumps on to the back foot and pulls the wrong un through midwicket, Johnson has no chance on the boundary
he sweeps powerfully this time but Symonds fields on the boundary
Ganguly opens the face of the bat and plays the ball to Symonds at short third man, Tendulkar had set off for the single but Ganguly sent him back
Ganguly plays the slog sweep this time and plays it uppishly towards deep backward square leg, the ball bounced just in front of Hopes
Tendulkar gets down on one knee and sweeps to short fine leg
slower ball on leg and middle stump, Ganguly works it off his pads towards midwicket
Ganguly moves towards the leg side and tries to hit through cover, he gets a thick bottom edge through mid off for a single
Hopes bowls a slower one on off stump, Tendulkar spots it, waits in his crease and opens the face to play it towards third man
Ganguly drives off the back foot through cover point for a single

clever shot, he knew where the fielder was and picked his spot to perfection, Tendulkar moved quickly towards the off side, got down on one knee and paddled the ball wide of the fielder at short fine leg

stumped! Hopes bowls a slower ball down leg side, Tendulkar comes a forward a little and tries to flick, he overbalances a little and gets beaten, Gilchrist whips off the bails in a flash and Tendulkar's back foot is just short of the crease, massive wicket for Australia
Ganguly waits on the back foot and cuts to Hodge at backward point
Pathan leans forward and drives towards Symonds who dives to his right and saves runs
defended towards the off side on the front foot
Pathan jumps down the track and uses his long reach to loft the ball over the fielder at mid-on for four more, that  just cleared the fielder
cut off the back foot to point
driven towards cover off the front foot
Ganguly backs away to make room and pulls Bracken over midwicket, Ponting has placed Hodge in the deep and Ganguly will get just the single

dropped but extremely difficult, the ball stopped on Pathan who tried to drive straight, it was the slower one, the ball went straight back towards Bracken who was moving to his right on his follow through, he stretched out his left hand and got a hand to it but couldn't hold on
cut firmly off the back foot wide of the fielder at third man for four
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
bowled full and in the channel outside off stump, Pathan pushes the ball to Ponting at cover
tight line and length on off stump, not letting Pathan get under the ball, defended towards mid-off on the front foot
good length delivery pitches on off and middle stump and angles into Ganguly who tries to work the ball off his pads, he gets a leg bye behind square
Pathan steps down the pitch to a full ball on middle stump and mis-times the drive to mid-on

superb slower ball, Johnson has Pathan in trouble as he bowls a slower ball on leg stump, Pathan had backed away towards leg to make room and Johnson followed him, he dabbed down at the ball and got an inside edge past Gilchrist for four
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Johnson strays down leg side this time and the umpire calls it wide
short of a length on off stump, Ganguly waits on the back foot and opens the face of the bat to play the ball towards point
a touch too short this time and a little wider as well, Johnson allows Ganguly to run the ball down to third man
low full toss on middle stump, Ganguly tries to drive through cover but hits it hard into the ground and mis-times the shot
tight line and length on middle stump, pinning Ganguly on the back foot, he drives off the back foot through midwicket
full toss angling into Pathan from over the wicket, Pathan leans forward and drives wide off the fielder at mid-on for four, that was the attempted yorker gone wrong
Pathan tries to pull one through midwicket but cannot beat Symonds who is super athletic at midwicket
such muscle! Pathan takes a stride forward and lofts Bracken high down the ground, that soars over the infield and just clears the straight boundary, expensive over from Bracken
bowled quicker and short on off stump, Pathan waits on the back foot and cuts to backward point
full and straight, played off the front foot towards mid on
Ganguly moves outside the line of off stump and tries to hit past the fielder at short fine leg, he gets hit on the pad and the ball rolls towards point
Ganguly moves his front foot out of the way to give himself room and lofts Lee back over his head for four more, clean crisp hit
full ball on off stump, Ganguly drives on the up and hits the ball in the air towards mid-off, he checked the shot and the ball fell just short of the fielder
shabby work from Bracken, Ganguly flicks a full ball on leg stump towards Bracken who lets the ball slip through his legs
Pathan leans forward to drive a full ball towards cover, he wants the single but Ganguly says no, and wisely too for it was Symonds who was at cover
fullish delivery wide outside off, Ganguly pushes it down to deep cover
played down with soft hands to cover, Pathan sets off quickly, Ganguly though struggles to make his ground which he eventually does. Gilchrist whips off the bails just after Ganguly grounds his bat
short of a length outside off, Ganguly opens the face and scoops it towards third man
full and pushed to the on side
glided deftly down to third man with an open face of the bat, Brett Lee makes a superb effort at fine leg to slide and gather the ball just inches from the rope
flighted on middle and leg, Ganguly goes forward and pushes it to long-on
well not quite, he settles for a forward defence down to the off side

and he sizes up to Symonds! flighted on middle and leg, Pathan gets on his knee and slog sweeps that across the line. There was a bit of confusion as to whether the ball cleared the rope or not. Six it is
pushed to the off side
flatter trajectory, outside the off stump, driven to deep cover
tossed up and full on the stumps, played back to Hogg
big turn from middle to off, beats the batsman
short of a length, ganguly cuts off the backfoot with the turn to deep cover
pushed back to the bowler
full and in the slot to drive, Pathan aims to drive it long-off but ends up pushing it back to Hogg

caught! Hogg gets it to turn square from middle to off, Pathan goes on the backfoot and tries to square cut it past point. Unfortunately he ends up cutting it uppishly and the ball lobs to Clarke at point
driven to point
flighted on legstump, Ganguly gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
pushed in flatter and faster, down towards the leg side, Ganguly pushes it to square leg
pushed down the leg side and wide called
pushed down to long-on, Symonds isnt giving it too much air.
played away past midwicket, Dravid sets off for the second run but was wisely sent back
slow delivery just outside off, Dravid waits on it and glances it down to short third man, cant find the gap
tossed on off and middle, Ganguly sweeps. The ball strikes him on the pads and Hogg appeals confidently
Dravid goes for the sweep, meets the ball on the pad. Hogg appeals again but that wasn;t going to hit the stumps
ganguly tries to force the pace by swinging across the line. Plays an inside out stroke to short third man
pushed to the off side for a single
tossed on middle and leg, shuffles and tucks it off the pads towards square leg
short of a length, Ganguly pulls across the line to deep square leg. Looked like a tired shot given that it was in the slot to be swatted away
banged in short, takes the pace off the ball. Ganguly backs away and tries to slice it over the infield on the off side and misses
good length on middle and leg, Ganguly stays back and tucks it to mid-on
good delivery on middle stump, gives no room to cut. Ganguly opts to open the face of the bat and fend it to deep point
short of a length, Dravid stays back but pushes it back to Johnson rather uncomfortably. He tries to work it to the on side but is squared up by the extra bounce
this time he swivels and glances it neatly down to fine leg
Ganguly innovates by moving across his stumps and glancing a low full toss down to fine leg

caught! Ganguly decides enough is enough and advances down the track to Hogg. He lofts through the line but the lack of power on the stroke doesnt give him the desired distance. The other Brad, Hodge,  runs across to his right from long-off and takes it easily
full, on off stump, pushed to cover
tries to paddle that from outside off, misses and the ball rolls to the off side
pushed down to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, Yuvraj sweeps confidently to fine leg
close! flighted on off stump, Dravid sizes to loft that over mid-off. Drives uppishly and luckily for him ,the ball just falls short of mid-off
banged in short, Yuvraj goes for the pull but misses. He played the shot too early and didnt keep an eye on the ball
bangs it in short again, hits Yuvraj on the ribs and rolls away to the off side
another short delivery,. another attempted pull. This time the ball gets him on the shoulder and rolls to the off side
short of a length, comes in with the angle, Dravid swivels and pulls to fine leg
attempted yorker, however Johnson cant contol the swing as the ball slides down the leg side
yorker length on legstump, Yuvraj shapes to flick it to the on side but the ball strikes him on the pad instead
holds the length back, Yuvraj gets in position early for the pull and connects. The ball goes to deep square leg
Hogg errs by pitching it too short, Yuvraj rocks on the backfoot and pulls across the line of the ball over midwicket
flighted on middle and off, almost a yorker, Yuvraj drives back to the bowler
low full toss on middle stump, Yuvraj gets down to sweep and misses. He's struck in line with the stumps and the umpire had no hesitation in giving that out
Dhoni defends on the frontfoot back to the bowler
pushed down towards long-on

appeal for leg before! Dravid shuffles across his stumps to flick that to fine leg, he exposes the middle and leg stumps. The ball spins in sharply and strikes him in line with the stumps. Umpire Saheba is unmoved and Hogg cant believe his luck
pushed down to the off side
short outside off and cut to third man
played across the line to the on side
full and pushed to the off side for a single
short of a length outside off and sliced to the off side
cut hard off the back foot but straight to Johnson at cover
Dhoni leans forward and tries to work it through midwicket but misses

caught in the deep! Dravid has been struggling to get going and he tries to clear the long on boundary, he doesn't get enough power behind the shot and Hodge takes a simple catch, Australia well on top now
Uthappa tries to flick but misses the ball down leg side
driven off the front foot to lid-on for a single
Dhoni lunges forward and defends, Hogg finishes his spell and has once again been outstanding, he finishes with 4 for 49
bowled flat on off stump, Uthappa stays on the back foot and plays it to square leg
driven down the ground to long off for a single
pulled off the back foot towards deep midwicket
Uthappa moves back and nudges the ball towards square leg
played to Ponting at midwicket off the back foot
bowled quick and fast on leg stump, Dhoni flicks off his pads but finds Clarke at square leg
what a start, he pitches it on middle stump and spins it away from Uthappa who tries to close the face and gets an inside edge to short third man
defended on the front foot to cover
tossed up on off stump, Dhoni hammers it back at Clarke who tries to catch it but decides that it would be wiser to get out of the way as the ball races to the straight boundary
tries to cut but gets a bottom edge to short third man
Uthappa tries to slog over midwicket but misses, Gilchrist tries to stump him but Uthappa's back foot is firmly grounded behind the crease
Uthappa backs away to make room and lofts Clarke inside out over extra cover, he's placed that in the gap and will get four

Lee begins with a slower ball and Dhoni clears his front foot out of the way and sends the ball into orbit in the direction of long-off with a powerful heave, the ball clears the boundary by the proverbial mile
full and wide outside the off stump, Lee's not bowling at full pace, Dhoni was ready to wind up but had to let it go to Gilchrist in the end
excellent yorker on middle and leg stump, Dhoni moves his front foot out of the way and pushes the ball towards long-on
Uthappa tries his trademark walk down the pitch against Lee but mis-times the drive to long-on
another one sears into the blockhole on middle stump, Dhoni chops down at it and gets a single towards cover
full and wide outside off stump, Uthappa uses the room on offer to free his arms and places the cover drive to perfection
too short from Clarke and Dhoni moves back and hits it with a flat bat down the ground, Symonds is very straight at long off and keeps the batsmen to a single
Uthappa moves across the stumps and plays a fine sweep for four, that was very deft from Uthappa
Uthappa plays a pre-meditated reverse sweep and misses the ball, that nearly bowled him
hammered for four, Gilchrist shouted 'catch' but Clarke was risking injury if he went for that, Uthappa had made room and blasted it down the ground
this time he connects with the reverse sweep and will get two more

Uthappa makes room to a short ball and lofts Clarke over extra cover, he's timed that well enough but Symonds is patrolling the  extra cover boundary, the ball just clears his head on the boundary line
full and wide outside off stump, Dhoni reaches out for it and plays the ball towards cover for a single
what a shot! Uthappa strolls down the pitch and lofts Bracken with a straight bat over his head, he didn't hit that with power but the timing was awesome, you won't see a straighter six than that
defended on teh front foot towards the off side
Dhoni reaches out and hits a wide ball to Symonds, the batsmen decide not to take him on, wides decision
in the block hole on middle stump, Dhoni tries to swing it through the leg side and gets an edge on it
Uthappa steps down the pitch once more but drives along the ground through cover this time
Uthappa steps down the track again and swings at a wide ball outside off stump, this time he doesn't make contact
and again, Johnson bowls it full and wide outside off stump and beats the advancing Uthappa on the drive
bludgeoned through the covers, Uthappa stays in his crease this time and drills the cover drive powerfully for four, he loves the arc between long-off and point
slower ball outside off stump, Uthappa tries to drive but gets beaten, the ball bounces off Gilchrist's pads and hits the stumps

dropped, would you believe it, Lee has dropped what is arguably the easiest catch one can hope to get, Uthappa moved across his stumps to play a Misbahesque scoop over short fine leg, he lobbed a slow looping catch to Lee who hardly had to move, it popped in and popped out
Dhoni drives and mises the ball, the ball hits Gilchrist on the way to the third man boundary for four byes
Uthappa drives a low full toss to long-on for a single
another full toss outside off stump, Dhoni throws his bat at it but mis-times the flat-bat shot to long off
another low full toss, Uthappa can't get under it and drives to long on for one more
full ball on off stump, Dhoni hits it hard into the ground towards cover for a quick single
excellent stuff from Bracken, Uthappa charges him and Bracken fires one into the block hole, driven to long on for another single
full toss and this time it isn't low, Dhoni stands his ground and pulls it wide of the fielder at long-on for four more

caught! Uthappa walks down the pitch one too many times and tries to loft Johnson down the ground, the outside edge flies high in the air in the direction of point where Hopes moves to his right and takes a well-judged catch, Australia have taken a crucial wicket
driven powerfully off the back foot but straight o Symonds at cover
Dhoni charges and has a wild swing at a slower delivery outside off stump, he was no where close to making contact

and that should be the match for Australia! Dhoni gets under a ball and hits it high in the air, Ponting runs back from mid-on and settles under the steepling catch, the crowds fall silent as the series all but slips away from India's reach
full ball outside the off stump, Harbhajan tries to drive but gets beaten
beaten outside the off stump once again, Harbhajan doesn't connect with the slog over midwicket, Johnson completes a double-wicket maiden in the 49th over, how's that for a knock-out punch
pushed down to long-on for a single, 27 needed from five balls
Bracken bowls the yorker on off and middle stump, Harbhajan keeps it out and gets single towards midwicket, Australia have won unless Bracken bowls a no-ball or two
another yorker, he can bowl them in his sleep by the looks of it, Zaheer backs away and drives to long-on
full ball on middle stump, driven to long on for one more
full toss outside off stump, Zaheer backs away and lofts down towards Lee at long off

and that is the match and the series for Australia, Harbhajan swats the final ball - a full toss - to the wide long on boundary but it matters not a jot, the Australians run in to celebrate a series victory that has been in the offing ever since that rained out fixture in Bangalore
